code: import React from'react';import{Map,Compass,Camera,Users,Shield,MapPin}from'lucide-react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Features=()=>{const features=[{icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Map,{size:32}),title:'Interactive Maps',description:'Navigate with ease using our detailed interactive maps and location guides.'},{icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Compass,{size:32}),title:'Curated Routes',description:'Discover the best travel routes and itineraries crafted by local experts.'},{icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Camera,{size:32}),title:'Photo Gallery',description:'Get inspired by stunning photography from travelers around the world.'},{icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Users,{size:32}),title:'Local Guides',description:'Connect with experienced local guides for authentic travel experiences.'},{icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Shield,{size:32}),title:'Safe Travel',description:'Access safety tips and guidelines for a secure and worry-free journey.'},{icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MapPin,{size:32}),title:'Hidden Gems',description:'Uncover secret spots and off-the-beaten-path destinations.'}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{id:"features",className:"features",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"section-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"section-badge section-badge-secondary",children:"Why Choose Globetrotter?"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Everything you need for an unforgettable journey through Chittagong Division"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"features-grid",children:features.map((feature,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"feature-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"feature-icon",children:feature.icon}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:feature.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:feature.description})]},index))})]})});};export default Features;
